homepage.title: Build, sell & collect digital items.
homepage.subtitle: Support the Armed Forces of Ukraine through digital auctions. Buy unique lots and help together!
homepage.about_title: Our mission â€” support the Armed Forces through digital auctions
homepage.about_description: We created a platform where anyone can list a lot, participate in auctions, and help the Ukrainian army. All funds go directly to the needs of defenders.
homepage.how_step_1_desc: Describe the digital item or service you want to auction.
homepage.how_step_2_desc: Bids are made online. The winner is the highest bid before the deadline.
homepage.how_step_3_desc: All funds go directly to a volunteer foundation.

aboutpage.title: About the project 'DobroBid'
aboutpage.subtitle: A platform that unites kindness, art, and the indomitable spirit of Ukrainians.
aboutpage.mission_p1: We created 'DobroBid' so that everyone can become part of a great cause â€” supporting the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Through charity auctions, every bid brings us closer to victory and peace.
aboutpage.mission_p2: We believe: even a small contribution made from the heart has enormous power.
what_we_do_list: Organize online auctions with real and digital lots.
Work with trusted volunteers, artists, veterans.
Ensure transparent processing of every bid.
Promote a culture of charity among youth and business.
Publish weekly reports on fund distribution.
aboutpage.step_1_desc: List a lot for charity auction or find one that inspires you.
aboutpage.step_2_desc: Participate in auctions. Every bid is a step toward victory.
aboutpage.step_3_desc: Win â€” and weâ€™ll deliver the lot, or support as a donor.
aboutpage.total_transferred_title: Over â‚´1,000,000 already transferred to the army!
aboutpage.total_transferred_desc: Thanks to kind people and transparent processes, we turn bids into real help.
aboutpage.join_us_desc: You can be part of a great mission â€” do a good deed that changes history. Together we are strong!

servicespage.title: What We Offer

services.title: Auction Management
services.desc: Easily list and manage auctions for both digital and physical items. Schedule start and end times, set reserve prices, and control approval flows.

services.title: User Engagement
services.desc: Boost participation with real-time bidding updates, notification alerts, and personalized experiences tailored to each bidder.

services.title: Analytics & Reports
services.desc: Track user behavior, bid frequency, donation history and more with powerful real-time analytics and custom dashboards.

services.title: Performance Optimization
services.desc: Built for scale â€” lightning-fast performance with server-side rendering, caching, and CDN delivery to ensure the best UX.

services.title: Community Building
services.desc: Create a loyal user base with leaderboards, donation streaks, trust scores, and gamification to drive interaction and cause impact.

services.title: Security & Privacy
services.desc: State-of-the-art security including two-factor authentication, end-to-end encryption, audit logs, and GDPR compliance.
